name: 環境地質學
comment: 初中階課程，適合大二以上學生修習。  本課程因含野外考察行程，考量一輛大型巴士載客人數限制，且因分車而造成教師與學生不同車的情形，不利教學，以及增加經費支出，故而調整修課人數上限至40人
description: 本課程主要探討地質作用和人類行為對目前及未來環境的影響，以及因應之道，並實施野外實地考察。
goals: 本課程目標主要在使學生瞭解1.環境地質學之基礎 2.地球內部的地質作用─地震、火山對環境的衝擊 3.地表地質作用以及其對環境的衝擊 4.地球資源─水、土壤、礦產的利用 5.廢棄物的處置、污染以及對人類(生物)健康的影響 6.土地利用、規劃與工程地質學
syllabus:
Week 1    Orientation

Week 2    Volcanoes (Ch. 5)

Week 3    Streams and Flooding (Ch. 6)

Week 4    Coastal Zones and Processes (Ch. 7)

Week 5    Mass Movements (Ch. 8)

Week 6    Ice and Glaciers, Wind and Deserts (Ch. 9)

Week 7    Climate—Past, Present, and Future (Ch. 10)

Week 8    Water as a Resource (Ch. 11)

Week 9    **Mid-term**

Week 10  Soil as a Resource (Ch. 12)

Week 11  Mineral and Rock Resources (Ch. 13) Student presentation

Week 12  Energy Resources—Fossil Fuels (Ch. 14) Student presentation

Week 13  Energy Resources—Alternative Sources (Ch. 15) Student presentation

Week 14  Waste Disposal (Ch. 16) Student presentation

Week 15  Water Pollution (Ch. 17) Student presentation

Week 16  Environmental Law and Policy (Ch. 19) Student presentation

Week 17  Land-Use Planning and Engineering Geology (Ch. 20) Student presentation

Week 18  Final exam
